brainly_data.question:
Beatles’ drummer, Richard Starkey, was born in Liverpool, England, so he is known to the world as Ringo Starr.

What is wrong with the sentence?
It has excessive coordination.
It has an incorrect conjunctive adverb.
It lacks parallel structure.
It has an incorrect coordinate conjunction.
